generate_diimine_smiles module¶

generate_diimine_smiles.format_R_smiles(R)[source]¶

Considering Hs are implicit in SMILES, if the R group is H, it should not appear in the molecule’s SMILES. Otherwise, it should have parentheses around it.

generate_diimine_smiles.make_diimine_complex_smiles(R1='H', R2='H', backbone_sub='H', Ni_L1='C', Ni_L2='C')[source]¶

Produces the SMILES for a Ni diimine complex given substituents on aryl and backbone, and ligands on Ni.

generate_diimine_smiles.make_diimine_ligand_smiles(R1='H', R2='H', backbone_sub='H')[source]¶

Produces the SMILES for a diimine ligand given substituents on the aryls and backbone.

generate_diimine_smiles.smiles_to_canonical_smiles(smiles)[source]¶

Converts any given SMILES representation of a molecule to the canonical SMILES representation.

ligands-ML
